alert.note: Alert for Niagara (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 19 at 10:15AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Niagara county. The heaviest amounts across the western part of the county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4307 7838 4319 7851 4322 7883 4316 7908 4300 7905 4288 7889 4281 7890 4288 7868 4292 7864 4299 7839 TIME Y22M11D19T0600Z-Y22M11D19T1500Z COORD...4317 7848 4328 7852 4335 7875 4329 7884 4326 7906 4307 7909 4288 7889 4283 7889 4288 7847 4298 7830 TIME Y22M11D19T1500Z-Y22M11D20T0300Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
